name: Ink drops
description: Circles have random allocation and radiuses on canvas, appearing with oscillation effect. The code is inspired by Vera Moln√©r works and art of Yayoi Kusama.

name: Dots Hallucinations Part 1
description: The variation of ink drops. Animation of circles moving and changing size on canvas based on speed and variation.

name: Dots Hallucinations Part 2
description: The variation of ink drops. The animation of circles moving and changing size on a canvas, and additional mini dots deriving from each circle.

name: Dots Particles
description: In this code the system of particles, which have random radius, velocity, hue and lifespan frames, moving around the canvas. Particles and velocity frames are intended to provide a calm atmosphere.
